reviewText: This does not work on USA dvd or blue ray. The writing stipulating this is very small for product description.
I love this movie! So much history into it and it's filled with great actors and actresses.

Awesome movie.  I saw it on a leave from work, and got a lot of information how racism still played apart in America.  Martha's Vineyard has history that's needed to be researched.  This movie gives you a head start and a new look at love not having a color or value.  Love is a learned behavior.
